authorships.raw_affiliation_string: Bill Gibson in a Professor in the Department of Economics at the University of Vermont, Burlington. Before this he was on the faculty of the University of Massachusetts at Amherst. He first started working on a model of the South African economy in the early 1990s as part of the Macroeconomic Research Group of the African National Congress and continued this work for a number of years as a researcher with the Development Bank of Southern Africa. email address:
